alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 5:46PM AKST until January 19 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility. Additional snow accumulations of one inch. Visibility one half mile or less at times. North winds gusting to 35 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills north of Unalakleet. * WHEN...Until midnight AKST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Snow and blowing snow are causing areas of low visibility. Large snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusting winds and low visibility in snow and blowing snow is now occuring at Shaktoolik. These conditions are expected to continue into this evening north of Unalakleet, then improve after midnight tonight as winds decrease. Conditions from Unalakleet south are much less severe with much lower wind speeds from Unalakleet south. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow down and use caution while traveling. &&

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
